HomePage.title: I'm Agustina
HomePage.description: who loves turning great ideas in to code

About.description: passionate about creating modern, accessible interfaces with a refined aesthetic. I love combining logic with design to transform ideas into real products.
About.currently: Currently, I work with technologies such as
About.end: and I continue exploring new ways to enhance the user experience with animations and intuitive design.

photoscape.title: Photoscape
photoscape.description: Freelance project for a private client who needed a modern and functional website to showcase their landscaping services. The site was designed to emphasize visual appeal, fast performance, and ease of navigation across all devices.
features: Responsive layout focused on highlighting high-quality project images.
SEO-friendly interface built with Next.js for speed and visibility.
Clean and modern styling with Tailwind CSS.
Smooth navigation with full responsiveness across screen sizes.
Dynamic sections for services, portfolio, and contact information.

m4life.title: M4Life
m4life.description: Institutional website for M4Life, a startup specializing in microbiological solutions for agriculture and the environment. The project focused on creating a professional online presence with a clean design and seamless user experience.
features: Brand identity design through colors, typography, and visuals.
Custom mockups created in Figma and refined with client feedback.
Clean, intuitive UI with subtle visual effects.
Fully responsive layout for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Contact form integrated with EmailJS for direct communication.

movies.title: Movies App
movies.description: A modern web app for discovering trending movies with a responsive and engaging interface. The app dynamically highlights what’s popular based on real user searches, offering a personalized experience.
features: Trending section that updates dynamically from user behavior.
REST API integration with Appwrite for real-time data.
Responsive UI styled with Tailwind CSS.
Dynamic filtering and search for a smooth exploration.
Deployed with Vercel for performance and scalability.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.description: Interactive map application built as a technical challenge to visualize geospatial data. Designed with React and Leaflet, it offers an intuitive way to explore regions with interactive layers and details.
features: Dynamic GeoJSON data loading from public assets.
Multiple map layers including roads and boundaries.
Interactive zones with hover highlights and info panel.
Responsive design optimized for all devices.

pokemon.title: Pokemon
pokemon.description: Full-stack web application developed at Henry Bootcamp to explore and manage a catalog of Pokémon cards. The app combines search, filtering, and CRUD features in a playful yet functional interface.
features: Pokémon cards displayed with pagination (12 per page).
Search by name, sort by alphabet or attack strength.
Filter by type and origin (API or custom).
Create new Pokémon with a validated form.
Detail view with edit and delete options.
